ai-tha-ap91:1.2_0: were so awakening to the Great Bodhi,
ai-tha-ap91:1.3_0: has gone forth in the peaceful,
ai-tha-ap91:2.1_0: The Kuvera’s mother is the best,
ai-tha-ap91:2.4_0: he will be extinguished, and he will go away.
ai-tha-ap91:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap91:4.1_0: Those who have no great delight
ai-tha-ap91:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
ai-tha-ap91:7.1_0: The Elder Nun Bodhi was completely queen
